messages.title: Your Green Party Candidate
messages.content: My name is Sophie, and I live in Bishop's Stortford with my husband and two young children.

messages.title: Vote for what you believe in
messages.content: Vote Green and you can help us build a society that works for the Common Good.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fight for a publicly funded, publicly provided health service free at the point of use.
End austerity and restore the public sector, creating over one million good jobs that pay at least a living wage.
Build 500,000 social rented homes by 2020 and bring empty homes back into use.
Take serious action on climate change by working with other countries to ensure global temperatures do not rise beyond 2 degrees.
Scrap university tuition fees and restore a comprehensive system of local schools offering mixed ability teaching staffed by qualified teachers.
Return the railways to public hands to stop profits being put before passengers.

issues.economy: End austerity and restore the public sector, creating over one million good jobs that pay at least a living wage.
issues.education: Scrap university tuition fees and restore a comprehensive system of local schools offering mixed ability teaching staffed by qualified teachers.
issues.environment: Take serious action on climate change by working with other countries to ensure global temperatures do not rise beyond 2 degrees.
issues.health: Fight for a publicly funded, publicly provided health service free at the point of use.

housing.content: Build 500,000 social rented homes by 2020 and bring empty homes back into use.

leaflet.personalStatement: My name is Sophie, and I live in Bishop's Stortford with my husband and two young children. After graduating from the University of St. Andrew's I worked in sales marketing for a large international company and a boutique independent business. My passion for people and their welfare saw me move to the charity sector to work for social justice and community-based volunteering projects. I came to Hertfordshire to raise my family and enjoy country life.

quotes.text: Imagine a political system that puts the public first. Imagine an economy that gives everyone their fair share. Imagine a society capable of supporting everyone's needs. Imagine a planet protected from the threat of climate change now and for the years to come. That's the future we want to create and believe we have the policies to do it.

leaflet.additionalNotes: This publication has not been paid for by corporate interests, but has been supported and funded by ordinary people and printed on 100% post-consumer fibre, FSCED recycled certified and PEFC (Process Chlorine Free) paper.
